column1: |- a memorial service for marjorie k. henriksen will be held tuesday
column2: july 7 at 2 p. m. at the christian life center church. marjorie passed away at the age of 95 at bee hive homes on june 13
column3: 2015. cremation is under the care of garden city funeral home. a complete obituary will follow. read marjorie henriksen's obituary and guestbook on www. missoulafuneralhomes. com.
